name: Energy Ring
description:
[I included an HTML version of the game to play for those who are just checking this out, but please download the executable for the best possible experience.]

You are in control of the Energy Ring, with the single purpose of keeping it from destruction. Waves of enemies will attempt to take it down from the inside, but using the 4 weapons equipped by the ring, you can fight back, but with a catch:
The weapons are powered by dice rolls. So as long as luck is in your favor, you may survive.

How long can you keep the Energy Ring from being destroyed?

This is my submission to the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice".

A tutorial on how to play the game can be accessed through the [Help] button on the main menu.
